#include <iostream>
#include <sstream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
       int T,count;
       string mains,temp1,temp2;
       
       cin >> T;
       getline(cin,temp1);
       
       while(T--)
       {
         count = 0;
         getline(cin,temp1);
         stringstream mains(temp1);
         while(mains >> temp2)
           count++; 
          cout << count << endl;
       }

       return 0;
       }
